a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Prevalence of anemia in pregnant women, 2000 to 2019
Prevalence of anemia in pregnant women, measured as the percentage of pregnant women with a hemoglobin level
less than 110 grams per liter at sea level.
Data source: World Health Organization (via World Bank)
